title: Saving Us
description:
Book six in the Mitchell Family Series starts off right where #5 left off. As Conner and Amy hope for a future together, they are faced with troubles standing in their way. With a baby in their near future, Conner takes charge and will stop at nothing until he can claim Amy as his, forever. There is only one thing stopping them...Amy's ex.This book is intended to be read in order with the series. 
It may contain content that is not suitable for anyone under the age of 18. It contains strong sexual and other adult situations.
author: Jennifer Foor
